name: Piratini
startIntroPart1: Hello, I hope we have good relations
startIntroPart2: The Pirish are a decided and Brave, they dont fear any enemy, after his formation on 1835,the pirish economy had grew rapidly, and with the constitutionaly Diarchy, they prevail after all wars, and with the lead of Hermann Kirchner, they will stand until the last man, Piece of Land, and oil drop, for the banner, GLORIENS FUR DEIN PIRSKLAND
declaringWar: You must pay for your sins!
attacked: So you wanted to play the War game, fine, It's my turn
defeated: Well, it was good while it lasted, i hope you take care of my people...
neutralLetsHearIt: Hello friend, What do you have to say? .
neutralYes: I hope this Benefit both nations.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
hateYes: That is good, but im only Accepting for The Good of My Nation.
afterPeace: Fine, we hope this peace last.
